t: Those*pn who trust in the Lord*s Are*ln as Mount Zion, which cannot be moved but abides forever.
As*ln the mountains surround Jerusalem, So*ln the Lord*s surrounds His people From*ln this time forth and forever.
For*ln the scepter of wickedness shall not rest upon the land of the righteous, So*ln that the righteous will not put forth their hands to do wrong.
Do*ln good, O Lord,*s to those who are good And*ln to those who are upright in their hearts.
But*ln as for those who turn aside to their crooked ways, The*ln Lord*s will lead them away with the doers of iniquity. Peace*ln be upon Israel.
